armor_types.name: Unarmored
armor_types.description: Weak against piercing attacks, moderate resistance to siege.

armor_types.name: Medium
armor_types.description: Balanced resistance to all damage types.

armor_types.name: Heavy
armor_types.description: Strong against piercing and normal attacks, vulnerable to siege.

armor_types.name: Fortified
armor_types.description: Extremely resistant to normal and piercing, vulnerable to siege.

armor_types.name: Ethereal
armor_types.description: Highly resistant to physical attacks, vulnerable to arcane.

armor_types.name: Magic Resistant
armor_types.description: Reduces damage from arcane and chaos attacks.
